functions.name: format_device_table
functions.description: Format OCR text from a fire alarm device table into a clean numbered list, preserving empty slots if needed for programming accuracy.

raw_text.description: Raw OCR output text from the fire alarm device table.

reading_mode.description: Reading mode: 'normal' = left to right; 'rotated' = bottom to top.

preserve_empty_slots.description: If true, maintains address order integrity by inserting 'Slot Empty' where rows/columns are blank.
